Package uk.ac.uea.framework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audio
    Interface that provides a common set of methods that can create two separate types of audio object
    Camera
    Created by Jack L.
    FileIO
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for file input/output
    GPS
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed to track the user's current location.
    Graphics
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for displaying graphics
    Image
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for displaying image objects which can be parsed to a Graphics canvas
    Input
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for handling user input
    Music
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for handling music playback
    Orientation
    Created by Jack L.
    Pool.PoolObjectFactory<T>
    Abstract factory, allows object-specific insantiations.
    Sound
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for playing sound
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    FrameworkCopyright
    An abstract class designed to provide a generic copyright class that displays the message of the University.
    Input.TouchEvent
    Static nested class that deals with the data associated with touch events and their location
    Pool<T>
    Class designed to link generic objects in a data structure in a way that makes it extensible and usable for any app.

    Class to implement the ability to share strings and images to social media.

    Camera.Orientations  
    Graphics.ImageFormat
